snippet.title: Negative: The Way of Shinobi -   Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Become a ninja prodigy, whose clan village was attacked by a mysterious sorcerer alongside the samurai army. Uncover ninja skills, use stealth or head-on approach. Reveal your father's secret intentions and stop the invasion.


Check this out on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1504010/Negative_The_Way_of_Shinobi/
